description: This file defines the PortfolioProvider class, which manages portfolio holdings, handles linking operations via mock services, and provides a summary of the portfolio. It uses ChangeNotifier for state management and interacts with MarketProvider and MockServices.

classes.name: PortfolioProvider
classes.description: A provider class managing portfolio holdings and linking operations, extending ChangeNotifier.

methods.name: PortfolioProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing with MarketProvider and MockServices instances.

methods.name: summary
methods.description: Computes and returns a summary of the portfolio based on current market quotes.

methods.name: linkPlaid
methods.description: Mocks linking via Plaid and updates link status.

methods.name: linkBroker
methods.description: Mocks linking a broker account and updates link status.

methods.name: addHolding
methods.description: Adds a new Holding to the portfolio.

methods.name: _setLinking
methods.description: Updates linking state and notifies listeners.
